name: All good things are 3
description:
A short  mini-game visual novel , in development and  I will continue  when  NaNoRenO 2022   has ended.

My visual resources were Clip Studio Paint EX BG Material, sprites from my OC Jade modeled in VRoid Studio, for the sake of finishing a playable Demo I didn't customized her yet - As prototype still cute, eh? ;) Release   draft as reference before NaNoRenO 2022 starts, check.

Big thanks to Imperf3kt for this   post    which is the base of the SSP-game  so far.   More various sprites will  replaced  ofc.
